effect.name: Color Adjust for Background
effect.description: Adjusts hue, saturation, lightness and contrast.
effect.author: Sketchy, Edit and DX11 Port by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Hue
parameter.description: Takes a value in degrees (0-360). eg: 180 = set hue to that directly opposite original hue on a color wheel

parameter.name: Saturation
parameter.description: Takes a decimal value (0-1). eg: 0.5 = set saturation to 50% of original saturation)

parameter.name: Lightness
parameter.description: Takes a decimal value (0-1). eg. 0.5 = increase lightness by 50% of original lightness

parameter.name: Contrast
parameter.description: Increases contrast by an arbitrary amount.
